title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 680.5 - Decisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 680.5 - Decisions

State Regulations
(a) Copies of the
resolution of the Public Health Council approving or disapproving on
application shall be transmitted to the applicant, the State Hospital Review
and Planning Council and the Commissioner of Health. (b) Copies of a notice that the council in
considering the disapproval of an application or action contrary to the
recommendation of the State Hospital Review and Planning Council and affording
an oportunity to request a public hearing shall be transmitted to the
applicant, the State Hospital Review and Planning Council and the Commissioner
of Health. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
680.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
